reviewText: I am deeply impressed by the life stories of those women. They are very honest and I am touched by what they went through and how they got on the other side of the tunnel. This movie gives hope and it is beneficial to see for addicted people, counselors and therapists, and family members - for everyone! The blend between their stories and the professional interviews was very well done. I hope many people can see this movie!

This gives a very honest and unique perspective. Great information and I'm planning on sharing this immediately!!!
Thank you Kristen for this!!!
This short film depicts loving women who struggle with a disease.  It is not preachy, just simply features these women's stories.
